title: 2024 AI Singing Superstar Competition
content:
分類： 活動公告
來源： 學務處衛生保健組 - 吳星穎 - carmier@gms.ndhu.edu.tw - 電話8906252
對象： 全校教職員_全校教師_全校職員_全校學生
標題： 2024 AI Singing Superstar Competition
日期： Thu, 21 Nov 2024 16:07:13 +0800
附檔： 英文版.png (1 MB)   2024 AI Singing Superstar Competition.pdf (183 KB)   
I. Event Purpose
To enrich the extracurricular or after-work activities of faculty, staff, and students,
cultivate an interest in music, and foster mutual improvement in singing skills through
this competition, thereby promoting physical and mental well-being.
II. Organizer
Health Care Division, Office of Student Affairs.
III. Participants
Faculty, staff, and students of National Dong Hwa University.
IV. Preliminary Round
1. Registration Method: Register online by scanning the QR code below or clicking
the following link https://forms.gle/QBa2tMDnYyS3ppkR6 to fill out the
registration form.
2. Registration Period: From now until 5:00 PM, November 22, 2024. Registration
results and selected songs will be announced on the Health Care Division website
and sent to participants' email by 12:00 PM, November 25, 2024.
3. Preliminary Round Date: December 2–4, 2024, 5:00–8:00 PM.
4. Preliminary Round Venue: Atrium of the Student Activity Center.
5. Participant Limit: A total of 90 participants (30 per day) from the faculty, staff, and
student body. Each individual is allowed only one attempt, and spots are allocated
on a first-come, first-served basis.
